suggest.mpdf/mpdf: Option for rendering PDF with PDF Writer
suggest.dompdf/dompdf: Option for rendering PDF with PDF Writer (doesn't yet support PHP8)
suggest.tecnickcom/tcpdf: Option for rendering PDF with PDF Writer (doesn't yet support PHP8)
suggest.jpgraph/jpgraph: Option for rendering charts, or including charts with PDF or HTML Writers
suggest.ext-zip: For zipped file support formats such as ODS and Xlsx
